title: Boards = riots way of hiding OCE CANCER!
body:
So riot realised they couldn't do anything about the community voicing their concerns about the CANCER OCE COMMUNITY!

So what do they do?

SHUT IT DOWN LOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOL!

LETS JUST SWEEP IT UNDER THE TABLE!

TRIBUNAL COMING *BEEN COMING FOR 2 YRS* ACCORDING TO RIOT LOLOLOLOL!
